H0.text: Which famous English highwayman was hanged for horse-stealing in April 1739. Dick Turpin

H1.text: Which famous English highwayman was hanged for horse-stealing in April 1739. John Nevison

H2.text: Which famous English highwayman was hanged for horse-stealing in April 1739. Tom King

H3.text: Which famous English highwayman was hanged for horse-stealing in April 1739. Black Bess

A4.text: Turpin was hanged at Knavesmire on 7 April 1739.

A5.text: Turpin was found guilty on two charges of horse theft and sentenced to death.
